channel.title: Noted models
channel.description: using galkons repacking to pack d claws and i can't get the noted model it's just stacking d claws rather than noting. did I do something in the itemdef wrong? im hoping this is an obvious fix... [img]http://i.imgur.com/LR7owoz.png[/img]

item.title: Noted models
item.dc:creator: @st0rmhawk st0rmhawk
item.description:
@st0rmhawk wrote:

sk8rdude461:

This would be client sided. The only thing the server handles with the stackable items is placing them in the same slot. The client is what draws the numbers above the item. When you note an item the server tries to find the “noted” version of it by searching the item.cfg (Or whatever your server uses) for “Swap this item for a” in the item’s description if it matches the item name. The client allows the item to turn into a note by using it’s toNote method.

thank you for explaining into detail! helped me alot! problem solved!

Read full topic

item.title: Noted models
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This would be client sided. The only thing the server handles with the stackable items is placing them in the same slot. The client is what draws the numbers above the item. When you note an item the server tries to find the “noted” version of it by searching the item.cfg (Or whatever your server uses) for “Swap this item for a” in the item’s description if it matches the item name. The client allows the item to turn into a note by using it’s toNote method.

Read full topic

item.title: Noted models
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

In your code or cache you need to specify that dragon claws are not a stack able item.

You will also need a inventory model for noted dragon claws probably.

Alternatively you could disable noting of dragon claws(Quick fix).

Read full topic
